name: Will survive only one
description:
Even in ancient times it was known duel appointed to resolve disputes, and other issues such as the struggle for a woman, for the right to land ownership, insult, revenge, finally just to show his power and humiliate, and even destroy the opponent. It's all in the past now dueling is prohibited, but not in this game, which is the most concise and accurate manner to provide you the definition of a duel. Wait for 3 seconds and shoot - it's simple. Do you dare to duel the computer or your friend?

Watch trailer: https://youtu.be/mAfr5FYByvc
